mobileControl.title: Control from your phone

sustainability.title: Sustainable energy
sustainability.description: Reduce emissions and commit to electric mobility.

safeInstallation.title: Safe installation and charging
safeInstallation.description: Protect your battery and electrical installation with equipment that fully complies with current regulations and is installed by a UTE-certified technician.

header.title: Charge your vehicle safely and avoid potential risks
header.description: An electric vehicle can represent one of the highest energy demands within a home, business, or shared facility. For this reason, charging must be carried out using equipment specifically designed for this purpose and with a proper electrical installation.

risks.title: Situations when dedicated equipment is not used

overload.title: Excessive strain on the electrical installation
overload.description: Electrical installations are not always designed for prolonged high-power charging, whether in homes, offices, or parking facilities.

protections.title: Electrical protections not designed for continuous use
protections.description: Standard circuit breakers and residual-current devices may not be suitable for this type of continuous consumption.

outlets.title: Use of non-dedicated outlets
outlets.description: Standard power outlets are not designed to supply an electric vehicle for several consecutive hours.

inefficiency.title: Energy inefficiency
inefficiency.description: In unprepared installations, energy losses may occur due to heating of conductors, connections, or adaptations, reducing charging efficiency and placing additional stress on the electrical system.

batteryWear.title: Constant 100% charging
batteryWear.description: Always charging to full capacity can accelerate battery wear.

dedicatedEquipment.title: Equipment specifically designed for EV charging
dedicatedEquipment.description: This is not an adapted outlet, but a system dedicated exclusively to this purpose.

powerRegulation.title: Power regulation
powerRegulation.description: Charging power adjusts to the capacity of the installation, preventing overloads in both residential and commercial environments.

smartScheduling.title: Smart scheduling
smartScheduling.description: Enables charging during off-peak hours and optimizes energy usage.

mobileControl.title: Mobile control
mobileControl.description: Real-time monitoring and management of charging through the app.

batteryCare.title: Battery care
batteryCare.description: Charging limits can be configured to extend the vehicle’s battery lifespan.

professionalInstallation.title: Professional installation
professionalInstallation.description: Installation is carried out by authorized technicians, with protections and configuration adapted to the equipment’s use and the environment where it is installed.

efficiency.title: Greater efficiency, better use of energy
efficiency.description: A proper installation and dedicated equipment allow for more efficient energy transfer, with fewer losses caused by overheating or improper connections. This results in more stable, safer charging and better use of the energy consumed.

ChargingSafetySection.closing:
Charging an electric vehicle is not the same as plugging in a household appliance.

 It is a specialized electrical installation, both in homes and businesses, and must be treated as such.

header.title: Choose the ideal charger for your installation
